alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Suffolk County through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Commack, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stony Brook around 305 PM EDT. Port Jefferson around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kings Park, Old Field, Setauket, Sunken Meadow State Park, Nissequogue, Poquott, Belle Terre, Head Of The Harbor, East Northport and Fort Salonga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
